verses.verse: In the beginning <WH7225> of the reign <WH4467> of Jehoiakim <WH3079> the son <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977>, king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, came this word <WH1697> unto Jeremiah <WH3414> from Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>,

And all the nations <WH1471> shall serve <WH5647> him <WH1121>, and his son, and his son <WH1121>'s son <WH1121>, until the time <WH6256> of his own land <WH776> come <WH935>: and then many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> and great <WH1419> kings <WH4428> shall make him their bondman <WH5647>.

But as for you <WH8085>, hearken ye not to your prophets <WH5030>, nor to your diviners <WH7080>, nor to your dreams <WH2472>, nor to your soothsayers <WH6049>, nor to your sorcerers <WH3786>, that speak <WH559> unto you <WH559>, saying, Ye shall not serve <WH5647> the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>:
for they prophesy <WH5012> a lie <WH8267> unto you <WH7368>, to remove you far from your land <WH127>, and that I should drive you out <WH5080>, and ye should perish <WH6>.

But the nation <WH1471> that shall bring <WH935> their neck <WH6677> under the yoke <WH5923> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and serve <WH5647> him <WH3240>, that nation will I let remain in their own land <WH127>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>; and they shall till <WH5647> it <WH3427>, and dwell therein.

And I spake <WH1696> to Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> according to all these words <WH1697>, saying <WH559>, Bring <WH935> your necks <WH6677> under the yoke <WH5923> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and serve <WH5647> him and his people <WH5971>, and live <WH2421>.

Why will ye die <WH4191>, thou and thy people <WH5971>, by the sword <WH2719>, by the famine <WH7458>, and by the pestilence <WH1698>, as Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> concerning the nation <WH1471> that will not serve <WH5647> the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>?

For I have not sent <WH7971> them <WH5002>, saith Jehovah <WH3068>, but they prophesy <WH5012> falsely <WH8267> in my name <WH8034>; that I may drive you out <WH5080>, and that ye may perish <WH6>, ye <WH5030>, and the prophets that prophesy unto you <WH5012>.

Also I spake <WH1696> to the priests <WH3548> and to all this people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: Hearken <WH8085> not to the words <WH1697> of your prophets <WH5030> that prophesy <WH5012> unto you <WH559>, saying, Behold <WH3627>, the vessels of Jehovah <WH3068>'s house <WH1004> shall now shortly <WH4120> be brought again <WH7725> from Babylon <WH894>; for they prophesy <WH5012> a lie unto you <WH8267>.
Hearken <WH8085> not unto them <WH5647>; serve the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and live <WH2421>: wherefore should this city <WH5892> become a desolation <WH2723>?

But if they be prophets <WH5030>, and if the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> be <WH3426> with them <WH6293>, let them now make intercession to Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, that the vessels <WH3627> which are left <WH3498> in the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and in the house <WH1004> of the king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, and at Jerusalem <WH3389>, go <WH935> not to Babylon <WH894>.

For thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> concerning the pillars <WH5982>, and concerning the sea <WH3220>, and concerning the bases <WH4350>, and concerning the residue <WH3499> of the vessels <WH3627> that are left <WH3498> in this city <WH5892>,

which Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> took <WH3947> not <WH1540>, when he carried away captive Jeconiah <WH3204> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiakim <WH3079>, king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, from Jerusalem <WH3389> to Babylon <WH894>, and all the nobles <WH2715> of Judah <WH3063> and Jerusalem <WH3389>;

yea <WH559>, thus saith Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, concerning the vessels <WH3627> that are left <WH3498> in the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and in the house <WH1004> of the king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, and at Jerusalem <WH3389>:
